members.name: Hongbing
members.title: Master Student
members.bio: Research focus: Cognitive impairment recognition, Affective computing

members.name: Wentao Xiang
members.title: Leader
members.bio: Research focus: Physiological signal analysis, virtual reality rehabilitation technology, emotion recognition
members.introduction: Wentao Xiang,associate professor of Nanjing Medical University, was selected into the Outstanding Young Teacher Training Program of Nanjing Medical University. He has published more than 20 SCI papers in journals such as Computer Methods and Programs in Biomedicine, Computers in biology and medicine, etc. It has won more than 10 national invention patents, software copyrights, etc. He presided over the sub-tasks of the National Natural Science Youth Foundation project and the National Key R&D Program, and guided the students to win 7 awards in science and technology competitions at or above the provincial level.
